script:
if doc.work_order and doc.stock_entry_type == "Manufacture":
    # Create a dictionary with item_code as the key and total_weight as the value
    item_weights = {
        i.item_code: frappe.db.get_value("Item", i.item_code, "weight_per_unit") * i.qty
        for i in doc.items
        if i.t_warehouse and frappe.db.get_value("Item", i.item_code, "weight_per_unit")
    }
    
    # Calculate total weight
    total_weight = sum(item_weights.values())
    
    # Calculate global unit costs
    global_unit_cost = doc.total_outgoing_value / total_weight if total_weight > 0 else 0
    global_unit_add_cost = doc.total_additional_costs / total_weight if total_weight > 0 else 0
    
    # Update the rows in doc.items
    for i in doc.items:
        if i.t_warehouse and i.item_code in item_weights:
            # Update basic_amount
            i.basic_amount = item_weights[i.item_code] * global_unit_cost
            # Update additional_cost
            i.additional_cost = item_weights[i.item_code] * global_unit_add_cost
            # Calculate and update basic_rate
            i.basic_rate = i.basic_amount / i.qty if i.qty > 0 else 0
